00036 #ifndef PACC_XML_Streamer_hpp_
00037 #define PACC_XML_Streamer_hpp_
00038 
00039 #include "PACC/Util/Assert.hpp"
00040 #include <iostream>
00041 #include <sstream>
00042 #include <string>
00043 #include <stack>
00044 
00045 namespace PACC { 
00046     
00047     using namespace std;
00048     
00049     namespace XML {
00050         
00085         class Streamer {
00086          public:
00088             Streamer(ostream& inStream, unsigned int inWidth=2) : mStream(inStream), mIndentWidth(inWidth), mClosed(true), mOneAttribute(false), mIndentAttributes(false) {}
00089             
00091             void closeAll(void);
00092             
00094             void closeTag(void);
00095             
00097             static string& convertToQuotes(string& ioString, const char* inQuotes="<>&'\"");
00098             
00100             unsigned int getPrecision(void) {return mStream.precision();}
00101             
00103             ostream& getStream(void) {return mStream;}
00104             
00106             void insertAttribute(const string& inName, const char* inValue);
00107                 
00109             void insertAttribute(const string& inName, const string& inValue) {
00110                 insertAttribute(inName, inValue.c_str());
00111             }
00112                 
00118             template <typename Type>
00119                 void insertAttribute(const string& inName, Type inValue) {
00120                     if(mIndentAttributes && mTags.top().second) {
00121                         mStream << endl << std::string(mTags.size()*mIndentWidth, ' ');
00122                     } else mStream << " ";
00123                     mStream << inName << "=\"" << inValue << "\"";
00124                     mOneAttribute = true;
00125                 }
00126             
00128             void insertCDATA(const string& inCDATA) {
00129                 PACC_AssertM(inCDATA.find("]]>",0)==string::npos, "an XML CDATA cannot contain any ']]>' substring!");
00130                 insertStringContent(string("<![CDATA[")+inCDATA+string("]]>"), false);
00131             }
00132             
00134             void insertComment(const string& inComment) {
00135                 PACC_AssertM(inComment.find("--",0)==string::npos, "an XML comment cannot contain any '--' substring!");
00136                 insertStringContent(string("<!--")+inComment+string("-->"), false);
00137             }
00138             
00143             template <typename Container>
00144                 void insertContainer(const Container& inObject, const string& inName="") {
00145                     // insert optional tag name
00146                     if(inName != "") openTag(inName);
00147                     // iterate through container
00148                     for(typename Container::const_iterator i = inObject.begin(); i != inObject.end(); ++i) {
00149                         (*this) << (*i);
00150                     }
00151                     if(inName != "") closeTag();
00152                 }
00153             
00155             void insertHeader(const string& inEncoding = "ISO-8859-1");
00156             
00161             template <typename Type>
00162                 void insertPrimitiveTag(Type inValue, const string& inTagName, const string& inAttName="v") {
00163                     openTag(inTagName);
00164                     insertAttribute(inAttName, inValue);
00165                     closeTag();
00166                 }
00167             
00169             void insertStringContent(const string& inContent, bool inConvert=true);
00170             
00172             void openTag(const string& inName, bool inIndent=true);
00173             
00175             void setAttributeIndentation(bool inValue) {mIndentAttributes = inValue;}
00176             
00178             void setPrecision(unsigned int inValue) {mStream.precision(inValue);}
00179 
00181             Streamer& operator<<(int inValue) {
00182                 insertPrimitiveTag(inValue, "Integer");
00183                 return *this;
00184             }
00185             
00187             Streamer& operator<<(double inValue) {
00188                 insertPrimitiveTag(inValue, "Float");
00189                 return *this;
00190             }
00191             
00193             Streamer& operator<<(const string& inValue) {
00194                 insertPrimitiveTag(inValue, "String");
00195                 return *this;
00196             }           
00197             
00199             template<typename Type> 
00200                 Streamer& operator<<(const Type& inObject) {
00201                     inObject.write(*this);
00202                     return *this;
00203                 }
00204             
00205          protected:
00206             ostream& mStream; 
00207             stack< pair<string, bool> > mTags; 
00208             unsigned int mIndentWidth; 
00209             bool mClosed; 
00210             bool mOneAttribute; 
00211             bool mIndentAttributes; 
00212         };
00213         
00214     } // end of XML namespace
00215     
00216 } // end of PACC namespace
